terms.Array: Collection of elements stored at contiguous memory locations.
terms.Linked List: Sequence of nodes where each node points to the next.
terms.Stack: LIFO (Last In, First Out) structure, uses push/pop.
terms.Queue: FIFO (First In, First Out) structure, uses enqueue/dequeue.
terms.Heap: Complete binary tree used for priority operations.
terms.Graph: Collection of nodes (vertices) connected by edges.
terms.Recursion: Function calling itself to solve subproblems.
terms.Binary Search Tree: Binary tree with ordered nodes enabling efficient search.
